roleset.name: be very angry
roleset.note: Roleset based on WordNet eventive noun entries. Corresponds to verb entry rage.02, which is a member of VerbNet class marvel-31.3-1. No FN entry. Framed by Claire.

example.name: Obama slip of the tongue
example.text: His rage over criticism of Benghazi far exceeds his rage over Benghazi.
